discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct.

B Correct Answer - pg 240 SAM Book - Before you retire the first step is to remediate the reconciliation results to ensure you remain compliant. You want to choose remove unlicensed installs option to identify the allocation and unlicensed installs to retire all the software entitlements.

choices.A: Notify users of the software retirement
choices.C: Uninstall all instances of the software

questions.question_text: Once you are ready to retire software in ServiceNow, what is the critical first step in the retirement process?

choices.D: Software Asset > Licensing > Entitlement import Errors
choices.A: System Import Sets > Load Data > Entitlement Import Errors

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
It is D. However, this will only be applicable with the classic SAM; other valid option would be the Software Asset Workspace > License Usage > Entitlement import errors.

Selected Answer: D
Errors in data streams exist and are not uncommon. By using the Import Entitlement capability, a number of exceptions are caught and presented to the SAM Pro user
in the Entitlement Import Errors table in the Licensing module.

questions.question_text: After importing your entitlements via the template where would you navigate to address any entitlement import errors?
Which are valid States of Remediation Options on the Software Asset Workspace License usage view after reconciliation has been run? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ADE
sys_choice.list - for table "amp_remediation_option" element "status" has following choices:
- new
- completed
- void
- in_progress
- completed_with_errors

Selected Answer: ADE
ADE is correct.
I thnk correct answer is A, D, E

questions.question_text: Which tab of the License usage view is used to reclaim software licenses that are not being used?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Software Asset Workspace > License usage > Removal candidates

questions.question_text: Which feature provides detailed, actionable information for software reconciliation?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is correct. https://www.servicenow.com/docs/bundle/xanadu-it-service-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/concept/license-usage-view-for-samf.html

choices.D: Software Asset Workspace License operations view
choices.C: Software Asset Workspace License usage view
choices.B: Software Asset Workspace Software asset analytics view
choices.A: Software Asset Workspace Success portal view
choices.E: Software Asset Workspace Normalization suggestions view
